title: Need Help IDing a Font...
content:
I’m sure this is an iconic that anyone can name easily... In any case, love this font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706085305im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cr_3571.jpg)

 [‹ Animal Crossing Dialogue font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706085305/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44796 "Go to previous forum topic") [Some quick help needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706085305/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44778 "Go to next forum topic")
author: asq

comments.content:
Whatthefont identifies it as DIN-Black (5th, after a couple of nah’s). I concur, see the low A bar, the flat-bottomed M, and the distinct numeral 6.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706085305im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/03cd77f6386f1d45ea78c07b842d9a1e_4495.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706085305im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/a87a1f59ad6bb3fcac995b19455809b7_6341.png)

(What does that “6PM til the wee” mean?)
Crap. Theunis posted at the same time. “til the wee” means <cite>until the wee hours</cite>; i.e. very early in the morning...

Must be a reference to drinking hours, then. This Lance bloke must’ve been notorious :-)

Using wtf feels like cheating. It looked familiar, but I couldn’t figure out the low bar A. Next one I’ll try all by myself.
Hey! Thanks all, I really appreciate everyone’s help with this!
